title: Tall, Mean & Darkly 2 - Taller, - AJ Llewellyn.zip
description:
Tall, Mean & Darkly #1: Jackson Avery is a big, tall, handsome, but very aggressive guy. He insists he is Chrissie and she--he--wants Gavin back. But Gavin isn't gay and not attracted at all to Jackson. It's never, ever gonna happen...or will true love really be able to conquer all?
